All linter rules

  1. Tools
  2. Linter rules
  3. All linter rules

The following is an auto-generated list of all linter rules available in the Dart SDK as of version 3.2.5. Add them to your analysis_options.yaml file and adjust as you see fit.

linter:
  rules:
    - always_declare_return_types
    - always_put_control_body_on_new_line
